name: Heavy Metal Assault
description:
There is an Alien Outbreak at Area 51!

Retired Heavy Metal Superhero is forced out of seclusion to collect all 3 key cards to shut down Area 51 and use the power of heavy metal to prevent the alien outbreak from reaching the rest of the world.

How to play:

Using Game Pad
Left stick to move. Bottom Face button to jump.
Right Face button to dash. Left Face button to strum your guitar for primary attack. Top Face button to throw drumsticks for secondary attack

Extras:

Holding down while jump can get you below certain platforms.
